eu.ensg.jade.xml

Class XMLGroundModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ensg.jade.xml.XMLModel
      • eu.ensg.jade.xml.XMLGroundModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IXMLExport

    public class XMLGroundModel
extends XMLModel
implements IXMLExport
    XMLGroundModel is the class which hold data representing a model connected to a terrain (heightmap), as defined in a scene.xml file

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class eu.ensg.jade.xml.XMLModel

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLGroundModel

        public XMLGroundModel(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String material,
                      XMLTerrain terrain)
        Simple constructor with basic model informations
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the ground model
        material - the path to the material used by this model
        terrain - the terrain geometry linked to this model

        Constructor with model information and transformation informations
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the ground model
        material - the path to the material used by this model
        terrain - the terrain geometry linked to this model
        scale - the scale Vector
        rotation - the rotation Vector
        translation - the translation Vector

      • toXMLElement

        public org.w3c.dom.Element toXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
        Description copied from interface: IXMLExport
        Convert a set of data, stored in class parameters, to an XML Element. This method is used to write the content of the class to an XML file with the correct format
        Specified by:
        toXMLElement in interface IXMLExport
        Overrides:
        toXMLElement in class XMLModel
        Parameters:
        doc - the XML document
        Returns:
        a new element that can be added to the XML file
